translated: The Collection of Birth Stories (Ekakanipāta)🔽The Varuna Chapter (Varuṇavagga)
The Birth Story of Varuna🔽The one who wants to do later
what should have been done earlier,
like the one who broke the Varuna tree,

analyzed: sa pacchā manutappati iti 🔽varuṇa jātakam paṭhama
translated: will regret it later.🔽The Birth Story of Varuna (1) is finished.
